markdown:
**Activate** envision ([visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You attempt a Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, or Performance check; **Effect** You gain a +4 status bonus to the triggering check. This ability has no effect if you're under the effects of a disguise that hides the _mask of allure_. Depending on the skill used, the mirrored silver transforms into one of the following appearances.
  • **Deception** A swirl of silver, which entirely obscures and conceals your normal features.
  • **Diplomacy** A kind, gentle and inviting expression.
  • **Intimidation** A monstrous visage that shocks viewers into paying attention.
  • **Performance** A jovial humanoid face, the mouth cracked wide with a comedic smile or a tragic frown, depending on the nature of the performance.
name: envision (visual)
